Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 21st overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1984...
Injured on 6/23/1986 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/1987, off Cliff Speck (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/27/1987, off Mario Soto (PIT)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1987, hitting .630 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Drove in 7 runs against Cincinnati on 5/11/1989...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 8/25/1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1989, hitting .571 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1992, hitting .414 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Cleveland on 1/31/1994 (Going to CHC: C J. Mizerock. Going to CLE: 1B S. Mack, RF O. McDowell, P T. Burke)...
Injured on 8/22/1994 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/15/1995 with a Dislocated Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
